title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Whisk eggs with grated pecorino and pepper.
Combine hot pasta with pancetta and egg mixture off the heat.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Grilled chicken simmered in a creamy tomato sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka paste for at least 30 minutes.
Grill or pan-sear chicken until cooked through.
Saute onions, add tomato puree; simmer.
Add cream, then the chicken; simmer a few minutes.
